summary: Racemenu preset for female nord based on the likeness of a sexy model.
descriptionHtml:
[b]This file is a racemenu preset for the female nord based on the likeness of a renown and sexy model named Encina Severa.[/b]
 
[b]There are two files, the first one (EncinaSevera.jslot) which is the racemenu preset, and the 2nd file (femalebrow_01.dds) is a set of custom eyebrows that I created specifically for this mod. One of the femalebrow_## files in the following directory computer/local disk/programfilesx86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/textures/actors/character/femalebrows must be overwritten. Read and follow the below instructions very carefully.[/b]
 
[color=#00ff00]===INSTALLATION===
[b]Step 1. After downloading this file, go into the directory [i]my computer/local disk/program files x86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets[/i] and drag and drop the file EncinaSevera.jslot into there. [/b][color=#ffff00]NOTE: before the "chargen" directory is created, you have to save a preset in racemenu, so just go into the racemenu screen and then go into presets, then press F5 to save any preset and create the directory.[/color]
 
[b]Step 2. Boot the game up, go into racemenu by typing "showracemenu" in the console, then click "presets" on the bar in the top right of the screen, and press F9 to load presets and load "EncinaSevera.jslot" (it should be in there) and voila, there you are![/b]
 
[b]Step 3. To install her eyebrows, go into the following directory[/b] [b]computer/local disk/programfilesx86/steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data/textures/actors/character/femalebrows and drag the femalebrow_01.dds file contained in the download into the open directory screen for skyrim's female eyebrow textures, drag and drop the file contained in this download into the Skyrim femalebrows folder click "move and replace" to replace the existing texture. Be sure to back up the original beforehand unless you want to lose them.[/b][/color]
 
[color=#ff0000][b]===REQUIREMENTS===
*SKSE 1.7.3 or above
*Racemenu (latest version)
*Xenius Character Enhancement Compilation Pack <---- XCE Compilation Pack is not 100% necessary but is strongly recommended![/b]
[b]*Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition (CBBE) OR Dimonized UNP Skinny (UNP) whichever you prefer[/b]
[b]*The Eyes Of Beauty
*SG Hair Pack 268 Edition By HelloSanta[/b][/color]
 
[color=#ffff00][b]Make 100% sure that you have the above mods installed before playing this or else this will not work properly![/b][/color]
 
[color=#00ffff][b][b]===Optional/Recommended===
Sexy Vanilla Female Armor for UNP and SevenBase with BBP[/b][/b]
[b]Red Dress UNP[/b]
[b]HN66s Golden Earrings[/b]
[b]Ashara Dimonized Dragon Dress And Jewelry[/b]
[b]Dovabling Jewelry Replacer[/b]
[b]Immersive Jewelry[/b]
[b][b]Bracelets By Ezuka
Sexy Swimsuit and bikinis for CBBE
Wedding Rings By Ezuka
FNIS Sexy Walk/FNIS 5.2[/b][/b][/color]
author: Kernel39
